title: Find most elastic point on linear demand curve

content.question: In the figure above, at which of the given points is demand most elastic?

choices.label: The elasticity is the same for all points.
The relative elasticity cannot be determined with the given information.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
